Author: strugglingpianist
Text: true, it is just about the industry. it just gets to me, I’ve had this idea for a long time that most people are either on the lower end of BMI or just overweight and this weirdly ‘confirmed’ it.

Author: TheManyArchetypes
Text: No. It is not.   This is not based on medical knowledge, this is based on an industry. Think about it like the modeling industry.   Don't let this skew your idea of what a healthy person should/can weigh.
